languages.text: "Полагаю, теологический диспут включал в себя применение святых даров Омниссии. Силовых, плазмовых и иных подателей мученичества".
"I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, теологический диспут включал в себя применение святых даров Омниссии. Силовых, плазмовых и иных подателей мученичества".

traits.locale_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved using the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."
"I presume this 'theological dispute' involved using the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."
"I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."
"I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."
"I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

languages.text: 「この『神学的紛争』とやらは、万機神の神聖なる贈り物が関与していたと思われる。フォース、プラズマ、その他殉教をもたらす類のものだろう」
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: 「この『神学的紛争』とやらは、万機神の神聖なる贈り物が関与していたと思われる。フォース、プラズマ、その他殉教をもたらす類のものだろう」

languages.text: “我推测，这场‘神学方面的争论’，主要争论的是如何使用欧姆尼塞亚神圣的礼物，其中包括原力科技、等离子科技，以及其他能用于殉道的科技造物。”
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: “我推测，这场‘神学方面的争论’，主要争论的是如何使用欧姆尼塞亚神圣的礼物，其中包括原力科技、等离子科技，以及其他能用于殉道的科技造物。”

languages.text: «Supongo que esta "disputa teológica" tenía que ver con el uso de los dones sagrados del Omnissiah. De las variedades de fuerza, plasma que, de otro modo, supondrían un martirio».
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que esta "disputa teológica" tenía que ver con el uso de los dones sagrados del Omnissiah. De las variedades de fuerza, plasma que, de otro modo, supondrían un martirio».

languages.text: « J'imagine que ce "litige théologique" a impliqué l'usage de dons sacrés de l'Omnimessie : la force, le plasma et d'autres variétés propres à créer des martyrs. »
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que ce "litige théologique" a impliqué l'usage de dons sacrés de l'Omnimessie : la force, le plasma et d'autres variétés propres à créer des martyrs. »

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, dieser 'theologische Disput' wurde mit den heiligen Gaben des Omnissiah ausgetragen. Kraftfelder, Plasma und Ähnliches, was rasch Märtyrer hervorbringt."
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, dieser 'theologische Disput' wurde mit den heiligen Gaben des Omnissiah ausgetragen. Kraftfelder, Plasma und Ähnliches, was rasch Märtyrer hervorbringt."

languages.text: "Herhâlde bu 'teolojik anlaşmazlık', Hermesih'in kutsal hediyelerini kullanmanıza vesile oldu. Kudret, plazma gibi şehitlik mertebesine eriştiren şeylerin yani."
languages.original_text: "I presume this 'theological dispute' involved the use of the Omnissiah's sacred gifts. Of the force, plasma, and otherwise martyrdom-bringing varieties."

traits.locale_text: "Bu 'teolojik anlaşmazlığın', Hermesih'in kutsal hediyelerinin kullanımıyla ilgili olduğunu tahmin ediyorum. Güç, plazma ve diğer acı veren çeşitlerin kullanımı yani."
